subject: Security Hint: Repository Access Code
body:
Dear Team,

Your new repository access code is the answer to this riddle:

"I have keys but no doors. I can type but never speak. What am I?"

Use the one-word answer as the code.

Best,
David Lee
Data Security Officer
explanation: A keyboard has keys and is used for typing but doesn't speak or open doors.

subject: Secure Terminal: Daily Login Code
body:
Dear Team,

Solve this to get today's terminal code:

"I stand between you and danger online, letting friends in and keeping strangers out. What am I?"

Use the answer as the code.

Regards,
Laura Martin
Cybersecurity Analyst
explanation: A firewall filters network traffic, allowing trusted connections and blocking untrusted ones.

subject: Vault PIN Update
body:
Dear Team,

Today's vault PIN is the solution to this riddle:

"Everyone wants me to be strong, unique, and secret. You use me to get in but never share me. What am I?"

Use the one-word answer as the PIN.

Regards,
Robert Kim
Cybersecurity Analyst
explanation: Strong, unique, secret passwords are needed to gain access but should never be shared.
